home.title: Welcome to Loventia.site!
home.subtitle: Find meaningful connections easily and safely.

superLike.premiumRequired: Premium required to use Super Likes.
superLike.quotaPremiumExhausted: You have used all your Super Likes for this week. They reset on Monday.
superLike.quotaFreeExhausted: You have used your weekly Super Like. Upgrade to Premium for more.

report.title: Report
report.helpText: Select a reason and optionally describe what happened. We use reports to improve safety, but we do not contact every reporter.
report.detailsHint: Do not include passwords or full payment details here. If you already sent money or card details, contact your bank or card issuer.

reason.scam: Scam or asking for money / financial help
reason.underage: I believe this user may be underage

report.thanks: Thank you. Your report has been received. We may review it as part of our safety checks.
report.error: We could not send your report right now. Please try again later.

settings.dealbreakersDescription: Configure hard filters for matches. This is a Premium feature and will apply to Discover.
settings.subscriptionDescription: Manage your Premium plan from here. You can start, manage, or cancel from the dedicated page.
settings.subscriptionSecurityNote: The next page uses our secure billing backend (Stripe). We never store your card details.
settings.sessionsDescription: If you suspect someone else may have access to your account, you can log out from all devices. This will invalidate refresh tokens and require sign-in again everywhere.
settings.sessionsLogoutAllHint: Your current session may also be logged out shortly after this action.
settings.sessionsLogoutAllInfoSuccessDefault: Logout from all devices requested. This device has been logged out.
settings.sessionsLogoutAllErrorDefault: Failed to log out from all devices.

ads.removeAdsBody: Upgrade to Premium to remove all ads.
